mealPlan.title: Meal Plan
mealPlan.buildMeals: Fitia will build your meals only with the selected foods
mealPlan.howMuchVariety: How much variety would you like in your meals?
mealPlan.highVarietyDesc: Ideal if you like to prepare different dishes every day
mealPlan.moderateVarietyDesc: Good if you like to repeat dishes but also want some variety
mealPlan.lowVarietyDesc: Perfect for making meal planning easier
mealPlan.simpleFoodsDesc: We will indicate the base foods, which you can cook as you prefer. Example:
mealPlan.recipesDesc: We will indicate dishes with detailed instructions. Example:

fasting.title: Choose a Fasting Plan
fasting.plan168: Fast for 16 hours and eat within an 8-hour window. Ideal for weight loss and improving metabolic health.
fasting.plan1410: Moderate fasting: 14 hours of fasting and 10 hours for eating. Suitable for beginners.
fasting.plan1212: Equal periods of 12 hours. Perfect if you're starting with fasting or looking for low impact on your routine.
fasting.customDesc: Adjust your schedule according to your lifestyle and goals. Ideal for advanced users or special needs.

register.welcomeTitle: Let's start your journey to a healthier life!
register.welcomeDescription: Now we will set up your personalized plan to achieve your nutrition and wellness goals.
register.goalDescription: We will calculate the calories you need to achieve it.
register.caloriesIntro: Now the first step is to discover how many calories you need daily.
register.needInfoText: We will need to know your age, gender, weight and height.
register.infoHelps: This information will help us calculate your target calories.
register.dietTypeQuestion: What type of diet do you prefer?
register.balancedDescription: The best option for you, a balanced mix of nutrients.
register.highProteinDescription: Ideal for building muscle and maintaining satiety.
register.lowCarbDescription: Perfect for losing fat and controlling appetite.
register.lowFatDescription: Good for improving cardiovascular health and losing weight.

premium.title: Premium
premium.simplifyProgress: Simplify your progress with the Premium Plan
premium.accessExclusive: Access exclusive features and premium content to enhance your experience.
premium.individualDesc: The Individual Plan offers all premium features for a single user, ideal for those seeking a personalized, distraction-free experience.
premium.familyDesc: The Family Plan lets you share your premium subscription with up to 5 family members, each with their own profile and access to all exclusive features.
premium.joinDesc: Enjoy all the benefits of the Individual Plan for only $9.99 per month or the Family Plan for only $14.99 per month.
premium.familyBenefit2: Personalized meal plans for each member
premium.familyBenefit4: Personalized reminders and notifications for each user
premium.familyBenefit6: Significant savings compared to individual subscriptions
